name: Perspectives - Digital Mosaics #1
description: Mosaic is a millennial art that is present in several cultures around the world and is one of the oldest forms of artistic expression of humanity. Many civilizations recorded their history using this technique. In addition, artists like Jorge Sealón, Burle Marx, Invader, Tomie Ohtake, Cláudia Sperb, Ligia Klarc, Antoni Gaudi, Rodrigo de Haro and many other artists and craftsmen who used this form of expression served as inspiration for this new series.
